name: rune.save.js
description: Rune.js plugin for saving a Rune SVG Sketch as svg, png, jpg and WebP. It works also as a standalone script to save SVG elements as images

scripts.build: npm run build:plugin && npm run build:script && npm run minify:plugin && npm run minify:script
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist/
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: Jorge Moreno, moro.es (@alterebro)
